languages.text: {n}Мужчина склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Несомненно, он будет счастлив услышать ваши слова. Прощаюсь с вами с легким сердцем, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Несомненно, он будет счастлив услышать ваши слова. Прощаюсь с вами с легким сердцем, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

languages.text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Несомненно, он будет счастлив услышать ваши слова. Прощаюсь с вами с легким сердцем, госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "Undoubtedly, he will be overjoyed to hear your words. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
{n}He bows deeply.{/n} "Undoubtedly, he will be overjoyed to hear your words. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
{n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
{n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."
{n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

languages.text: {n}他深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“毫无疑问，您的话一定会让他欣喜若狂。请允许我怀着轻松的心情与您告别，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}他深深地鞠了一躬。{/n}“毫无疑问，您的话一定会让他欣喜若狂。请允许我怀着轻松的心情与您告别，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Le encantará saberlo, no me cabe duda. Me despido de usted con suma alegría, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hace una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Le encantará saberlo, no me cabe duda. Me despido de usted con suma alegría, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}男は深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「その言葉を聞けば大いに喜ばれるでしょう。軽やかな気持ちでお別れできます、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「その言葉を聞けば大いに喜ばれるでしょう。軽やかな気持ちでお別れできます、陛下」

languages.text: {n}Er verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Er wird ohne Zweifel überglücklich über Eure Worte sein. Ich scheide nun mit leichtem Herzen von Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er verbeugt sich tief.{/n} "Er wird ohne Zweifel überglücklich über Eure Worte sein. Ich scheide nun mit leichtem Herzen von Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Il s'incline très bas.{/n} « Il sera ravi d'avoir de vos nouvelles, à n'en pas douter. Je vous laisse donc avec le cœur léger, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'incline très bas.{/n} « Il sera ravi d'avoir de vos nouvelles, à n'en pas douter. Je vous laisse donc avec le cœur léger, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Şüphesiz, sözlerinizi duyduğuna çok sevinecektir. Huzurunuzdan vicdanım rahat ayrılıyorum {mf|lordum|leydim}."
languages.original_text: {n}He bows deeply.{/n} "He will be overjoyed to hear your words, no doubt. It is with a light heart that I part with you, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Şüphesiz, sözlerinizi duyduğuna çok sevinecektir. Huzurunuzdan vicdanım rahat ayrılıyorum {mf|lordum|leydim}."
